subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Putnam birdied five of the first eight holes and finished with a seven-under-par 64 to take the lead in the PGA Tour’s O.H.L. Classic in Mexico.
snippet: Putnam birdied five of the first eight holes and finished with a seven-under-par 64 to take the lead in the PGA Tour’s O.H.L. Classic in Mexico.
